from yolobit import *
button_a.on_pressed = None
button_b.on_pressed = None
button_a.on_pressed_ab = button_b.on_pressed_ab = -1
from machine import RTC
import time

def on_button_a_pressed():

  pin3.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

button_a.on_pressed = on_button_a_pressed

def on_button_b_pressed():

  pin3.write_analog(round(translate(0, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

button_b.on_pressed = on_button_b_pressed

if True:
  pin3.write_analog(round(translate(70, 0, 100, 0, 1023)))

while True:
    pass


if pin0.is_touched():
  display.scroll((''.join([str(x) for x in ['%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[4]), ':', '%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[5])]])))
if pin1.is_touched():
  display.scroll((''.join([str(x2) for x2 in ['%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[2]), '-', '%0*d' % (2, RTC().datetime()[1])]])))
time.sleep_ms(100)

display.scroll((round(translate((pin1.read_analog()), 0, 4095, 0, 100))))
time.sleep_ms(1000)
name: quat
